featured.text: Daphne said that her dream for the future is to see ivory banned, all stored ivory destroyed and no one wearing an ivory ornament ever again.
If it can be expanded, the prickly pear could be the key to Mexico’s energy future.
Cars in the future will be characterized by their use of gasoline.
The forces that are crushing individual lives and futures are also destroying the prospects for an entire region. 49.
The successful candidate, usually __(19)__ two or three, was then removed from his family to Lhasa to begin spiritual training for his future role.

other.text: They feel optimistic about future plans on weight control.
Future plans include static barking sites where deer are commonly seen, but “the noises will not be blared in areas where people live beside the tracks.” 53.
In the future when the population grows, there will be no need for the recording because the howler monkeys will have more reason to check in with the neighbors to define their own territories.
Which of the following best describes the author’s attitude toward the future of desalination? (A) Amazed.
Rapid advancement in motor engineering makes it _____ possible to build a flying car in the near future.
1. Visit the websites of these colleges and find out which college has departments ___(27)___ courses that interest you or will help you prepare for your future career.
Future plans include a cooperative effort among many nations to stop littering in space and to clean up the trash already there.
Nothing much will change in the near future for them.
Professor Thrun has even envisioned a future in which there will only need to be 10 universities in the world.
The future may be a vehicle-accident-free era.
On June 19, 2001, an agreement was signed between the International Olympic Committee and the International Paralympics Committee to keep this 30 in the future.
To predict the future agriculture policy of Mexico.
Many people try to save a lot of money before _____, since having enough money would give them a sense of security for their future.
Future bank robbers will not need explosives to blow open bank safes—all they will need is someone who can break computer codes.
__(27)__, if you touch something hot and feel pain, you will learn from this__(28)__ that you should not touch that item in the future.
When the material has been recovered, the disk is returned to the sender with a diagnosis and a prescription for avoiding the problem in the future.

definition.zh_def: 未來；將來的時間或事件。
definition.en_def: The time that is yet to come; events that have not yet occurred.
definition.example: I am excited about what the future holds for us.
